message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on text classification using deep recurrent neural networks (RNNs) and transfer learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the use of pre-trained word embeddings and sentence representations, which falls under the scope of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a joint learning approach for multiple text classification tasks, which can be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The experiments involve analyzing the effectiveness of the approach on various transfer and linguistic tasks, which can be related to cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
